In this topic we study _discrete time Stochastic Processes_, countable sequences of random variables indexed in time.  The material covered in these notes was prepareed during my time working as a teaching assistant under both Prof. Tomoyuki Ichiba and Prof. Vellaisamy Palaniappan for their respective versions of the PSTAT160A Stochastic Processes course at UC Santa Barbara.
